abstract: Learn about changes to the tvOS SDK.
overview:
## Overview

The Apple Developer Program provides everything you need to build and distribute your apps on the App Store for Apple TV. Membership includes access to beta OS releases, advanced app capabilities, and tools to develop, test, and distribute apps. For more information, visit [https://developer.apple.com/programs/].

### Bug Reporting

For issues not mentioned in release notes, file bugs through [https://developer.apple.com/bug-reporting/].

# tvOS Release Notes

Learn about changes to the tvOS SDK.

## Overview

The Apple Developer Program provides everything you need to build and distribute your apps on the App Store for Apple TV. Membership includes access to beta OS releases, advanced app capabilities, and tools to develop, test, and distribute apps. For more information, visit [https://developer.apple.com/programs/].

### Bug Reporting

For issues not mentioned in release notes, file bugs through [https://developer.apple.com/bug-reporting/].

## tvOS 26

- **tvOS 26.2 Beta 3 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **tvOS 26.1 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **tvOS 26 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
